Anak Buah Anies Mundur saat Heboh Anggaran, Tjahjo: Tanya Pak Gubernur
04 Nov 2019, 09:23 by Usman Hadi


Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo/Foto: Usman Hadi/detikcom

Yogyakarta - Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo enggan mengomentari mundurnya dua anak buah Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan belum lama ini. Kedua anak buah tersebut mundur di tengah kencangnya sorotan terhadap rencana anggaran Ibu Kota."Jangan tanya saya, itu bukan bidang saya, tanya Pak Gubernur (DKI)... Ya (Kemenpan RB) nggak ada urusan, tanya Gubernur (DKI)," ujar Tjahjo saat ditanya wartawan Yogyakarta terkait mundurnya dua anak buah Anies, Senin (4/11/2019).Kedua anak buah Anies itu yakni Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan DKI, Edy Junaedi, dan Kepala Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Daerah DKI, Sri Mahendra. Menurut Tjahjo, mundurnya kedua pejabat tersebut merupakan urusan Anies."(Mundurnya dua pejabat itu) urusannya Pak Gubernur (DKI) saja. Mundur kan boleh-boleh saja, nggak ada masalah," terangnya.Tjahjo hanya menjelaskan mundurnya seseorang dari jabatan publik merupakan hak masing-masing orang. Oleh karenanya, ia menyerahkan polemik mundurnya dua pejabat itu ke Anies."Setiap pegawai kan punya hak untuk terus mengabdi. (Kalau) dia merasa nggak mampu, kalau nggak mampu ya bisa dipindah atau mengajukan mundur... Pak Anies lebih tahu (masalahnya)," pungkas Tjahjo. Anies Subordinates Retreat at Budget Break, Tjahjo: Ask the Governor
Nov 04 2019, 09:23 by Usman Hadi


Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucracy Reform (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo / Photo: Usman Hadi / detikcom

Yogyakarta - Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (PAN-RB) Tjahjo Kumolo was reluctant to comment on the resignation of two DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan's recently. The two subordinates withdrew amidst the intense focus on the capital budget plan. "Don't ask me, that's not my field, ask the Governor (DKI) ... Yes (Kemenpan RB) has nothing to do, ask the Governor (DKI)," Tjahjo said when asked by Yogyakarta journalists about the resignation of two of Anies's men on Monday (11/04/2019). The two Anies men were the Head of DKI's Tourism and Culture Office, Edy Junaedi, and the Head of DKI's Regional Planning and Development Agency, Sri Mahendra. According to Tjahjo, the resignation of the two officials is an affair of Anies. "(Resignation of the two officials) is the business of the Governor (DKI) alone. Resignation is fine, there is no problem," he explained. Tjahjo only explained that withdrawing someone from public office is a right each person. Therefore, he handed over the polemic of the resignation of the two officials to Anies. "Every employee has the right to continue serving. (If) he feels inadequate, if he can't, he can move or propose resign ... Mr. Anies knows better (the problem) , "concluded Tjahjo.
